title.text: Models for the Semantic Classification of Noun Phrases

abstractContent.text: This paper presents an approach for detecting semantic relations in noun phrases.

entities.text: detecting semantic relations in noun phrases

abstractContent.text: A learning algorithm, called semantic scattering, is used to automatically label complex nominals, genitives and adjectival noun phrases with the corresponding semantic relation.
